findings.title: Potential Post-Auth Open Redirect
findings.description: The url parameter accepts various inputs. While Secure Gateway blocks direct external URLs, the parameter may be used for post-authentication redirect. Several bypass patterns return 200: //google.com, ////google.com, /\google.com
findings.note: Need to complete auth to see if redirect occurs after login

findings.title: No CAPTCHA on Authentication
findings.description: Login form has no CAPTCHA protection. May be vulnerable to credential stuffing if rate limiting is weak.
findings.note: Program rules prohibit brute force - test rate limiting only

findings.title: CSRF Token Analysis Needed
findings.description: Hidden CSRF token present. Need to verify if token changes per session and is properly validated.

findings.title: Phone Number Based Auth
findings.description: Auth uses phone number. Could test for user enumeration via response differences.

blockedPatterns: CRLF injection attempts (403 with Rule G.S.211080)
secureGatewayBehavior.note: Secure Gateway bypasses are marked Informative per program policy
